00010         super(connection);
00011     }
00012 
00013 
00014     public void commit() throws SQLException {
00015         super.commit();
00016 
00017         Statement st = null;
00018         try {
00019             st = createStatement();
00020             st.execute("CHECKPOINT");
00021         } finally {
00022             if (st != null) {
00023                 st.close();
00024             }
00025         }
00026     }
00027 
00028     public void rollback() throws SQLException {
00029         super.rollback();
00030 
00031         Statement st = null;
00032         try {
00033             st = createStatement();
00034             st.execute("CHECKPOINT");
00035         } finally {
00036             if (st != null) {
00037                 st.close();
00038             }
00039         }
00040     }
